data.title: International Money Transfer - Money Transfer App
data.meta_description: The most convenient way to send money to loved ones abroad. Dahabshiil is a trusted online money transfer service, with flexible payment options.
data.text:
Experience the security and affordability of Dahabshiil, your partner in international money transfers and specialist to money transfers to Africa. Using cutting-edge technology, we ensure your transactions are both safe and cost-effective, providing peace of mind with every transfer.

We provide money transfers to +100 countries worldwide including to Somali, Somaliland, Kenya, Tanzania, Djibouti, Ghana, South Sudan, Uganda and beyond.

The United Nations describes Dahabshiil services as ‚Äúthe only safe and efficient option to transfer funds to projects.‚Äù

Everyone has their own preferred methods of sending money to loved ones abroad. Our fast, flexible and trusted solution puts you in control. We want money transfers to be hassle-free.

Whether it‚Äôs sending funds through a cheap international money transfer or using an alternative to international money order, Dahabshiil provides diverse options that cater to your money transfer needs without compromise.

As Eid al-Adha approaches, we‚Äôre excited to join you in preparing for this joyous occasion. At Dahabshiil, we believe in making every moment special, and this Eid, we‚Äôre pulling out all the stops to bring you incredible offers and a chance to win amazing prizes!

In the spirit of Ramadan, Dahabshiil warmly invites you to partake in the celebration of generosity and unity. ü§≤üèΩ As the sacred month approaches, we are thrilled to announce a unique giveaway, specially crafted to enhance the Ramadan experience for you and your loved ones. Join us on this meaningful journey as we strive to make your Ramadan exceptionally memorable. Dahabshiil is honoured to share the blessings of this holy season with you, creating moments of joy and reflection.

Cultural Celebrations and Solidarity Through Transfers

Support global unity with Dahabshiil. Our services help you maintain connections and support loved ones across borders with ease and efficiency.

Cheap Money Transfer Services with Global Coverage

As one of the premier money transfer companies, Dahabshiil offers unbeatable rates and minimal fees in over 100 countries. We ensure your money reaches where it needs to go with reliability and speed.

From GPB, EUR, USD, CAD, we provide unbeatable exchange rates and low cost fees on your money transfers to friends and family.

Comprehensive Customer Support

Our 24/7 dedicated team is here to assist with any questions via chat or phone, ensuring your money transfer process is smooth and straightforward.
